snippet.title: The Stars Under Lockehurst (Official Trailer)
snippet.description:
The Stars Under Lockehurst is a romantic supernatural mystery visual novel about a grad student visiting their friend in the small coastal town, Cape Lockehurst. Here, they unravel the mysteries behind recent disappearances and peculiar happenings around town.  

Inspired by H.P. Lovecraft’s Call of Cthulhu and similar works, this game explores fear of the unknown and the unknowable, featuring a cast of unique, romanceable characters (who just might be a little... fishy).

Play for free on itch.io: https://nulljamgames.itch.io/thestarsunderlockehurst

The Stars Under Lockehurst was developed in one month for Spooktober VN Jam 2024. It was made with old and new friends of Null Jam Games, but is not under ownership of the studio. 

Credits
Pauline Reinacher – Character Design, CGs, Sprites, UI,  Prop Art 
Rex – Monster Design, Sprites, Prop Art
Toffl– Background Art, UI Art
Dominik Figlhuber – Background Art 
Charlie – Background Art
m3t4lp0w3r – Composition
Ryan Sherlock  (discord: sherlock1998) – Audio Design
Molli Shuker– Project Management, Writing 
Vit– Programming/ Unity Development
Yaygun– Minigame Programming

Cast
Garret Ward – Maliki LaForce
Angélique LeBeau – Lena Garcia
Ophelia Panchal – Lauren Pak
Mikel Javier Ordóñez – Danny S.
Sanraya Bahande – Jonna-Lynn Alonso

Trailer by Molli Shuker
